text.div:
Generated Narrative: OperationDefinition SubmitMedicationRequestBundle

URL: [base]/Bundle/$submit-medication-request-bundle

Parameters

UseNameScopeCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INbundle1..1Bundle

The GPlusMedicationRequestBundle containing the medication request and all referenced resources (MedicationRequest, Patient, Practitioner, Encounter, Medication, Location, Organization, Provenance).

OUTreturn1..1Bundle

On success: The accepted Bundle with assigned IDs. On failure: An OperationOutcome detailing validation errors.

name: SubmitMedicationRequestBundle
title: Submit Medication Request Bundle
description: This operation accepts a GPlus Medication Request Bundle containing medication request data and all referenced resources. The system validates the bundle for plausibility and integrity. On success, the data is accepted and stored. On failure, an OperationOutcome is returned with details about validation errors.

parameter.name: bundle
parameter.documentation: The GPlusMedicationRequestBundle containing the medication request and all referenced resources (MedicationRequest, Patient, Practitioner, Encounter, Medication, Location, Organization, Provenance).

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: On success: The accepted Bundle with assigned IDs. On failure: An OperationOutcome detailing validation errors.
